name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"3193a4f3-2219-4449-b63f-decd31b7d40e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: FASTEN Structure Generation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0b93d81e-ca1c-446d-aa53-c8e0e759355e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group Description","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eb918842-e7bb-47dd-913d-5dc1cfba1c21","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group is responsible for constructing all core FASTEN schema artifacts from the internal state prepared by the formatter. It transforms raw analysis data into structured representations that conform to the FASTEN data model, including dependencies, modules, class hierarchies, and call graphs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"245a5ac2-37ff-4a7a-aed0-ae070f4c5e89","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Together, the functions in this group form the final stage of the FASTEN formatting pipeline, culminating in the assembly of a complete, self-contained FASTEN-compliant output document.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b5ef7dba-1720-4a34-a4d4-75afec019cff","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"c47d34f2-3e67-403b-998a-27db5a2b2792","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: find_dependencies","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b7d562fb-bdde-4ef5-a6ce-a686be94ce4d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"find_dependencies","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function extracts external package dependencies by reading and parsing a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"requirements.txt","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file associated with the analyzed package. It converts Python version specifiers into FASTEN-compatible version constraint ranges.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7cb589b0-2acc-4330-9a45-d2529b945dcb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function populates the dependency set (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"depset","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") of the FASTEN document. By translating Python packaging semantics into a standardized constraint format, it enables dependency analysis across different ecosystems.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"82aaff82-df20-4c46-a840-4146198b0e1c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"513208a3-b798-49ad-96f7-775a54aa1e74","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: get_modules","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f98552cf-f4dc-4296-98d1-7abcfbf7548c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_modules","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function builds the FASTEN modules section by iterating over all internal modules discovered during analysis. It records source file paths, assigns unique numeric identifiers to namespaces, and captures metadata such as line number ranges.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7c11c3d1-e67d-443a-8e16-0297556267f0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function defines the structural layout of the analyzed package. The generated module and namespace definitions serve as the foundation for class hierarchy and call graph references.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"66379d2f-8664-4519-9c93-7d18d33069ab","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"cb7bf10a-512f-4e5a-984d-29322dfccf94","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: class_hiearchy","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"196fca04-d147-4fe6-a7c3-b6aeb5ae2bfd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"class_hiearchy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function constructs the class hierarchy graph by linking each class to its parent classes based on method resolution order (MRO). Parent classes are resolved to internal namespace identifiers when available, or to external FASTEN URIs otherwise.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9045d756-933a-49b1-88bb-6785fcdcdd07","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function encodes inheritance relationships in a format suitable for static analysis and architectural reasoning. It ensures that both internal and external inheritance relationships are accurately represented.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e6cd2d2d-b27f-4be5-8eb4-e8a959efc8c3","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"899048d8-9f42-43da-a03c-e35916b66aa8","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: get_graph","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bdaa1eae-bca0-4cb8-98b2-702a34403776","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_graph","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function generates the FASTEN call graph by processing call edges extracted from the analysis phase. It separates internal calls from external calls and resolves all call endpoints into FASTEN identifiers or URIs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c29bbc85-2474-4556-8c20-58398532d852","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function captures behavioral relationships between code elements. The resulting call graph enables detailed analysis of control flow and dependency usage within and outside the analyzed package.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ae739307-cbc8-4861-afd6-6271a70c0fb5","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"562b6c4b-bfca-4d6f-8aba-18074cca91dd","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: generate","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f89ea18a-8661-4b53-82db-cfa29df39e9b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function assembles and returns the complete FASTEN output document. It integrates metadata, dependency information, module definitions, class hierarchy data, and call graph structures into a single FASTEN-compliant representation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f546af47-93b6-408c-9797-2a8722820896","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function acts as the final orchestrator of the formatting process. It ensures that all FASTEN components are properly constructed and combined into a coherent and consumable output.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f2c7a939-3bee-489b-aa32-c70fae30d3dd","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"1164e9bf-1484-4724-8fd6-392205b2bdb9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Perspective","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7ac3bbd4-cb82-4d2b-b1fb-345406070633","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The functions in this group emphasize transformation and assembly rather than initialization or resolution. Each function contributes a well-defined FASTEN artifact, and together they produce a complete, standards-compliant view of the analyzed software package.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f8b7ebf6-3bd4-4781-8101-af8a782e53b9","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"911b5d2d-392d-48f8-9f4e-e21ac280e7ba","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
